page.title: 19Sports Facilities
page.content: Other{recreational {facilities}are provided at Virginia Park, Morgan Jones Park and Aneurin Park,which include the following:- 10 play areas 1 mini rugby 1 play ground 2 bowling greens 7 football pitches 2 rugby pitches 2 cricket squares 6 tennis courts 1 sub-size football pitch 1 nine hole crazy golf There are two golf courses,1 private,1 public.Various school halls and minor halls are used for aerobics,keep-fit, yoga and other activities.Riding and pony-trekking are also popular and mounts can be hired by the hour or by the day.Fishing and Model Boat Clubs use the moats and lakes of Caerphilly Castle. Forest and hill-walking are also enjoyed in the vicinity.
